articles.title: Britain considers offering Lilly weight-loss drug on better terms than Wegovy - Reuters
articles.description: Britain's medical costs regulator on Tuesday recommended Eli Lilly's weight-loss drug Mounjaro for some patients with obesity and suggested not placing a time limit on the medicine's use as it had for rival Novo Nordisk's Wegovy.

articles.title: H7 bird flu found on third poultry farm in Australia - Reuters
